name: Praxis AI
headline: Manufacturing reasoning agents to predict and prevent machine failures
description:
Praxis AI builds manufacturing specific agents capable of reasoning and processing complex situations. Our engineering copilot predicts and prevents machine failures in real time by solving problems the same way an engineer would.

Our agents have access to and make sense of the structured and unstructured data that exists at factories including machine sensor data, maintenance manuals and work orders. Our simplified interface enables manufacturing teams with minimal AI knowledge to create custom complex workflows on the machinery they know is critical to their operations. Early results have shown that Praxis can help manufacturers reduce their unplanned production downtimes by as much as 25%. 

Existing solutions focus on dashboards and complex charts. We know that dashboards don't cut costs, actions do.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:iot; industry:manufacturing; industry:data-science; industry:ai-assistant; location:new-york

founders.name: Aditya Tewari, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO of Praxis AI. Previously a tech lead at Palantir that specialized in converting early stage enterprise customers in the manufacturing vertical by building AI solutions. I’ve been passionate about AI/ML for 8+ years since high school when I first helped startups in my local Cincinnati area optimize their marketing strategies.

founders.name: Ransika Liyanage, Founder
founders.description: I've spent 8+ years working in the manufacturing industry. During that time I've experienced firsthand the frustration of spending my entire shift resolving a machine downtime, which ultimately could've been prevented. Existing solutions are too focused on dashboards and metrics rather than actions. That's why I'm passionate about arming manufacturing engineers with Praxis AI, enabling them to combine their tribal knowledge with AI insights.

## Manufacturing OS  powered by AI
# Reduce the biggest bottlenecks in your manufacturing process from procurement to assembly

#### 65%
of manufacturers report supplier delays

increase in operational efficiency for data-driven production planning

## The Praxis AI OS is the foundation for your digital manufacturing journey
  * ###### Industrial Data Connectors
Our team has curated an extensive list of data connectors to ingest your manufacturing data from day one
  * ###### Advanced Digital Twin
Convert your existing equipment hierarchy to a digital twin of your plant, enabling teams to quickly link data across machines
  * ###### Agent-based Automations
The Praxis OS utilizes our copilot Max.e to automate tasks like generating predictive work orders with an agentic approach


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67347b5d2d34e882738672b3/67afc495e4855657590cd4eb_Frame%202.png)
## Purpose built manufacturing applications that you can configure from day one
![icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67347b5d2d34e882738672b3/67b02c7f836b6937ae3f23c6_Group%201009002139.svg)

## Eliminate part shortages
Enable your material planning teams to automate their inventory management and order compliance with custom forecasting, and supplier risk mitigation
Demand Forecasting
Utilize real-time demand forecasting to constantly update required part quantities
AI-Generated supplier Outreach
Trust in Max.e to manage your suppliers and ensure parts are delivered on-time 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67347b5d2d34e882738672b3/67b04a89ac26ee049c2b2a0d_View%20generated%20schedule%20-%20chart%20view.png)
## Optimize order sequencing
Utilize a fully customizable optimization engine to generate the most efficient production schedules with just one click
Fine tuned to your Plant
Identify and prioritize optimization goals that are unique to individual plants in your enterprise
Dynamic Rescheduling Notice
Max.e is constantly preparing updated sequences for unplanned machine failures
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67347b5d2d34e882738672b3/67b04cd97426b7ddc9aafc1d_Maintenance%20-%20Stage%20Drilldown%20\(1\).png)
## Upgrade Machine Reliability
Leverage advanced AI/ML to track and predict machine downtime's on your critical machinery
Live and Historical Analysis
Enable modeling on historical trends and real-time predictions to identify true root causes for major downtimes 
Predictive Work Orders
Integrate directly with your CMMS to push predictive work orders that can help prevent machine downtimes

generated_description:
### Praxis AI: Revolutionizing Manufacturing with Intelligent Reasoning

**Founded:** 2024  
**Location:** New York  
**Team Size:** 2  
**Y Combinator Batch:** F24  
**Group Partner:** Garry Tan  
**Website:** [praxis-tech.ai](https://praxis-tech.ai)

---

**Mission:**  
Praxis AI is on a clear mission: to develop advanced reasoning agents that can predict and prevent machine failures in the manufacturing sector. Imagine having an engineering copilot that operates in real-time, identifying potential issues and mitigating them before they impact production. That’s exactly what Praxis AI aims to deliver.

**Overview:**  
Initially, Praxis AI launched with a focus on building manufacturing-specific agents capable of reasoning through complex situations—similar to how a human engineer would troubleshoot. What sets them apart is their ability to handle both structured and unstructured data—everything from machine sensor metrics to maintenance manuals and work orders. 

By simplifying the interface, Praxis AI empowers manufacturing teams, even those with minimal AI expertise, to craft customized workflows tailored to their unique operations. The early returns are promising: manufacturers using Praxis can cut their unplanned downtimes by as much as 25%. 

**Market Insight:**  
Most existing solutions rely heavily on dashboards and intricate charts, but Praxis understands that dashboards don’t drive results—actions do. They’re focused on creating intelligence that leads to proactive measures. 

**Key Features of Praxis AI:**
- **Industrial Data Connectors:** Right from day one, users can integrate their existing data streams without hassle.
- **Advanced Digital Twin:** This feature models your equipment hierarchy, allowing for quick inter-machine data correlation.
- **Agent-based Automations:** Their co-pilot, Max.e, automates tasks such as generating predictive work orders, streamlining manual processes.

**Impact on Manufacturing:**  
With 65% of manufacturers grappling with supplier delays and a staggering $1.5 trillion lost annually due to unplanned downtimes, Praxis AI is stepping into a significant gap in the market. The reality is, manufacturing inefficiencies are rampant, and data silos often hinder collaboration. Praxis AI is here to turn that around.

**Transformative Solutions:**
- **Predictive Maintenance:** By leveraging advanced AI and ML techniques, they track and predict potential downtimes for critical machines.
- **Demand Forecasting:** Their systems offer real-time insights, allowing manufacturers to adjust quickly to market changes.
- **Optimized Order Sequencing:** With one click, users can generate the most efficient production schedules tailored to their plant’s specific needs.

**Try Before You Buy:**  
Praxis AI offers a 1-week free trial to unlock the full potential of their technology. They invite manufacturers to define a use case, provide access to their data, and watch the system deliver immediate results.

---

In a world where operational efficiency can make or break a business, Praxis AI stands out as the innovative partner manufacturing industries need. With their commitment to proactive solutions and actionable insights, they’re primed to redefine what’s possible in manufacturing.

If you’re in the manufacturing sector, this is the moment to consider integrating smart technology into your processes. Transform your operations effortlessly with Praxis AI!
